disclaimer_start: Disclaimer: I am not a certified architect or building professional. The following is an illustrative example and should not be taken as professional advice. Please consult with a qualified expert for final designs.

rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area with wide doorways ensuring wheelchair accessibility and ample space for maneuvering.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area designed in Colonial style with comfortable seating and natural lighting, oriented according to Vastu principles to promote positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen layout with essential cabinetry, island counter for wheelchair accessibility, and proper ventilation as per building norms.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent dining space integrated within the living room or open plan layout, ensuring easy access from the kitchen.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Well-lit library area with accessible shelving, comfortable seating and a quiet ambiance, following Vastu guidelines for knowledge and creativity.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Wheelchair-accessible bathroom including grab bars and sufficient turning space to meet local norms.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Space allocated for storage of household items and cleaning supplies, designed to be accessible with features that meet the needs of wheelchair users.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated room featuring soundproofing, comfortable seating (with accessibility in mind) and state-of-the-art audiovisual equipment, ensuring a private entertainment experience.

openings.description: A wide, accessible entrance door with ramps if needed.
Large windows to allow ample natural light in accordance with Vastu principles.
Double-car garage door ensuring easy access for vehicles and wheelchair users.

disclaimer_end: Disclaimer: Please consult with a qualified architect or building professional before making any design decisions.
